name: @modly/c2e
description: c2e is a Mocha/Chai & cypress.io test scaffolding helper losely aligned with TOGAF, Agile practices & other common concepts to produce end-to-end test files mapping organizational (c)apabilties to(2) (e)xpected outcomes / criteria (i.e. expect(A).to.equal(B), cy.get().contains(), etc)
author: cy.walker@modlycrew.com
